description:
*** Update info below. ****
Zemanim, is an App for Jews around the world to easily know the times to pray, light candles etc. You can get zemanim for your location using gps, or for any location in the world, by tapping a few buttons, you can easily send the zamanim via email or sms, and you can get zemanim for any date you want.

zemanim listed are Alos, Netz, Latest time for Shema, Latest time for Shacris, Hatzot, Earliest Mincha, Mincha Gedola, Candle lighting (friday only), Shkia (sunset), Nightfall (50min's), Nightfall (72min's)

Update 1.0.3: added mishayakir-earliest talis, and added zemanim prefs page to change amount of minutes for candlelighting, and nightfalls.
